organization.$: College of Liberal Arts, Department of Material Science, International Christian University

head.citation-title: Two-Sided Clifford Fourier Transform with Two Square Roots of -1 in Cl(p, q)
head.abstracts: We generalize quaternion and Clifford Fourier transforms to general two-sided Clifford Fourier transforms (CFT), and study their properties (from linearity to convolution). Two general multivector square roots ∈ Cl(p, q) of -1 are used to split multivector signals, and to construct the left and right CFT kernel factors. © 2014 Springer Basel.

organization.$: College of Liberal Arts, Department of Material Science, International Christian University
